page.title: 09LOCAL HISTORY-DOMEN GASTELL
page.content: Domen Gastell is a motte and bailey castle.It was built around 1170 by Owen Fychan as his headquarters.In 1165 he joined with his cousin Owen Cyfeiliog on an attack against his Uncle Iorweth Goch of Mochnant.Owain Fychan was slain by Owen Cyfeiliog"s son.The circumference of the moat is 480 ft all around and 65 feet from the top of the motte to the moat.The moat was about 8 feet deep from the top to the bottom.The top of the motte is 42 by 39 feet.It is 350 feet above sea level.It was originaly a wooden castle with a wooden pallacade.It would have been a simple structure with a keep for the lord and his family and a few barns and huts.They would have kept pigs, chickens and horses.
